attributes.action: rewrite the oath taken on Coronation so that the incoming monarch states they will be a "Defender of Reason" rather than "Defender of the Faith"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is some debate about whether Prince Charles should be defender of the Christian religion but no other faiths when he becomes king, which rather goes against Prince Charles stated wish that he should be a "Defender of Faith" rather "Defender of The Faith". This rather misses the point. 

It is rather the case that "Reason" is in need of very real support. The scientific establishment has been under threat from the merchants of ignorance for hundreds of years. The oppression of scientists, such as Galileo and Copernicus, who gave us the first realistic view of the universe despite the pressure from the Church, continues afresh today with renewed vigour. Scientists at the forefront of medical research are being openly attacked by ignorant extremists in several groups, especially the religious right in the US who are even now exercising a malicious influence on politicians. In this country the scientific establishment is routinely under threat on several fronts. It needs defence, preferably from the very top of society.
